title: Wahlberger King, Free Pizza for Karens? 8.3.20
itunes:title: Wahlberger King, Free Pizza for Karens? 8.3.20
description:
In episode 685, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Fight Island podcast co-host Sam Wiles to discuss the USPS needing monetary help, different companies hoping on the Karen train, how the baseball season is going, Spenser Confidential, Last Chance U, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. USPS Gift Shop
  2. USPS Plans to Slash Hours at Many Post Offices, Hoping to Save A Buck
  3. Treasury agrees to lend Postal Service $10 billion in trade for rivals’ shipping contracts
  4. Calgary brewery pulls Karen Cherry Sour beer recognizing entitled, privileged white women
  5. Calgary company pulls Black Lives Matter gelato in face of criticism
  6. CALLING ALL (MASK WEARING, LAW ABIDING) KARENS!
  7. Dominos Will No Longer Reward 'Nice Karens' With Free Pizza
  8. Play ball? Experts mixed on 60-game MLB season
  9. The weirdest MLB season ever is about to start. Here's how baseball in 2020 could play out
  10. 3 MLB games postponed as Marlins deal with coronavirus outbreak
  11. MLB fake crowd noise will not include booing, per report
  12. The Dodgers Put A Cutout Of The Late Brody Stevens At Dodgers Stadium
  13. The Koreatown Oddity - Weed In L.A.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
